title: Best of The Program | Guests: Sen. Mike Lee, Bill O'Reilly, & Glenn Greenwald | 9/24/21
description:
Sen. Mike Lee joins to discuss the basic rights Americans are at risk of losing and government spending. Bill O’Reilly joins for his weekly news recap, President Biden’s plummeting popularity, Hunter Biden’s never-ending laptop story, the border crisis, and COVID mandates. Journalist Glenn Greenwald joins to discuss the Biden family emails found on Hunter's laptop and how they were suppressed by the corrupt media.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
